body: I just started playing Minecraft again and Avicus, but I don't have my prestige like I had before (pink one), could someone tell me what replaced prestige because I see people with stars next to their name.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Thanks, AW5UMTURNIP
body_tagged: I just started playing Minecraft again and Avicus, but I don't have my prestige like I had before (pink one), could someone tell me what replaced prestige because I see people with stars next to their name.<br id="null"><br id="null"><br id="null">Thanks, AW5UMTURNIP
title: Where did my Prestige go?

replies.body:
Prstiges have been replaced with Badges.
XP has been replaced with Credits and it's all been reset.

Basically every kill and objective you get earns you credits. Since you have the Gold rank you get a 1.5 times multiplyer too (WooHoo!)

You can buy items (like badges) in the lobby.

The lobby's been redone too.
Hoped that helped a bit.

replies.body:
LIke snow said but in more detail:

Prestige is replaced with badges. Like when you prestige you get a badge, except here you purchase badges w/ credits.
XP is now Credits (Like OCN and their raindrops)

Lobby has been changed and there is a chatbot. So I like that. :)
Now you can use credits to get lobby items!1!1! No more donor rank or online purchase needed xd

But welcome back xddd

replies.body: Thanks guys, I will start playing Avicus again once my temp ban is over :D
